pullRequest.title: Service Area Task - update UI
pullRequest.bodyText:
I think we could lay out the UI of this sample a bit neater. Currently the buttons are all in a long row without any space.
This PR puts the buttons in a control area, and re-arranges the buttons slightly so that it's clearer that the toggle group buttons (create facility, create barrier) are related.
It's a bit of extra FXML code but I do think it makes the sample easier to use and it looks much smoother
